statements: DELETE FROM customer_interactions_campaign_metrics WHERE customer_id = 101 AND interaction_type = 'Email';
DELETE FROM customer_interactions_campaign_metrics WHERE customer_id = 100 AND interaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND campaign_performance > 0.8;
DELETE FROM campaign_metrics WHERE campaign_name = 'Spring Sale Campaign';
DELETE FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 101 AND interaction_type = 'Email';
DELETE FROM campaign_metrics WHERE total_interactions < 100 AND total_conversions = 0;
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' AND interaction_date < '2022-01-01';
